common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: [For BR Shop Only] Use this API to get shop KYC registration and qualification information.
params:
{"request_params":[],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RCyPpse"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NKENnXr"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"6745b892295d750abf83a29430510400","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"NKCDhMN"},{"description":"

Onboarding information of the Shop.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"CmNYdpp","children":[{"description":"

Type of the shop’s tax ID. Applicable values: 

\n

1: Personal seller (CPF)
\n2: Company seller (CNPJ)

","name":"tax_id_type","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"WSwBQNm"},{"description":"

The shop’s tax ID.
- When tax_id_type = 1 (Personal seller), it is CPF.

- When tax_id_type = 2 (Company seller), it is CNPJ.

","name":"tax_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MEWkXQ"},{"description":"

CPF number of the individual seller. Valid only when tax_id_type = 1.

","name":"cpf_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JTEjeSC"},{"description":"

CNPJ number of the company seller. Valid only when tax_id_type = 2.

","name":"cnpj_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ataHKCZ"},{"description":"

Full name of the individual seller. Valid only when tax_id_type = 1.

","name":"name","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JTMKfCN"},{"description":"

Legal name of the company seller. Valid only when tax_id_type = 2.

","name":"legal_entity_name","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"PaGEXhY"},{"description":"

Birthday of the individual seller (stored as Unix timestamp). Valid only when tax_id_type = 1.

","name":"birthday","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"FdWbJJC"},{"description":"

Birthday of the individual seller (formatted as YYYY-MM-DD). Valid only when tax_id_type = 1.

","name":"birthday_str","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GxyrSHj"},{"description":"

State registration number of the shop.

","name":"state_registration","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ZXAtyPR"},{"description":"

Shop’s billing address details.

","name":"billing_address","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"YcNZiYX","children":[{"description":"

State of the billing address.

","name":"state","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"idRFtRC"},{"description":"

City of the billing address.

","name":"city","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"iiAyPmZ"},{"description":"

Specific detail of the billing address.

","name":"address","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"TYxJYEM"},{"description":"

ZIP code of the billing address.

","name":"zipcode","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FmmnSCK"},{"description":"

Neighborhood of the billing address.

","name":"neighborhood","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dWEzxaC"}]},{"description":"

Status of the shop’s current KYC onboarding process. Applicable values:

0: None
1: Regis Processing

2: Regis Validated

3: Regis Rejected

4: KYC Pending
5: KYC Processing
6: KYC Processing Manually
7: KYC Validated
8: KYC Rejected

","name":"onboarding_status","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"CNWXSTB"},{"description":"

Timestamp when the onboarding information was submitted.

","name":"submission_time","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"GsBhFFp"},{"description":"

Nationality of the individual seller. Valid only when tax_id_type=1.

","name":"nationality","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"aFCCBci"},{"description":"

Main CNAE code.

","name":"cnae_main","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ySjpMQW"},{"description":"

Secondary CNAE code.

","name":"cnae_secondary","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"SamzYjK"},{"description":"

MEI verification result. Applicable values:

0: No
1: Yes

","name":"mei_check","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"aCXEzdR"},{"description":"

Indicate if the shop has passed KYC verification.

","name":"onboarding_passed","sample":"","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"hRbBMRW"}]}]}
